steps.title: Okay, so here's my process for entering my house
steps.description: Okay, so here's my process for entering my house.

steps.title: I get the remote control and hit the power button on here
steps.description: I get the remote control and hit the power button on here.

steps.title: To start up TV
steps.rewrittenDescription: 4. Press the power button to turn on the TV.

steps.title: Then I come over to my place here and I turn on all the lights
steps.description: Then I come over to my place here and I turn on all the lights.

steps.title: And then, once I'm done with that, I come over here and open your driver to see if there's any food
steps.description: And then, once I'm done with that, I come over here and open your driver to see if there's any food.
steps.rewrittenDescription: 6. Check the driver for any food.
